description:
This wooden hang board is easier on the fingers than plastic holds and looks great in any room. It delivers a lush assortment of challenges, including jugs, edges, pockets and a big sloper. Use sandpaper to customize the texture to your liking.

  • Dimnsions: 61 x 21.6cm
  • Includes comprehensive instructions, training guide, and mounting hardware
name: Metolius Wood Grips Deluxe II Hangboard
